General.Name: Zhejiang Shengyang Science
General.Description: Zhejiang Shengyang Science and Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, and sale of communication equipment for radio frequency cable industries and satellite communications operators primarily in China, Europe, and the United States. It offers 75-ohm coaxial cables, data cables, electronic wires and other products, and high frequency heads for use in cable TV, satellite TV, fixed network, and other standard signal transmission systems. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Shengyang Cable Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Shengyang Science and Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2010. Zhejiang Shengyang Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
General.Address: No. 1416-1417, Renmin East Road, Shaoxing, China, 312000

1.Name: Ms. Qiu Ting  Wu
